<h1 style="padding-top: 3pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">Contest Creation Platform / <span style=" color: #E69037;">Contest Platform</span></h1><p class="s2" style="padding-top: 3pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">assignment12_category_0005</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p class="s2" style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">Note: Assignment must responsive all device .</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p style="padding-left: 8pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 1pt;text-align: left;"/><p class="s3" style="padding-top: 7pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">DESCRIPTION <i>:</i></p><p class="s5" style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 118%;text-align: justify;">Wglcomg ľo ConľgsľHub, ľhg ulľimaľg plaľform whgrg innovaľion mggľs rgcogniľion! ConľgsľHub is a dynamic and usgr-frigndly Projgcľ Conľgsľ Crgaľion Plaľform dgsigngd ľo fosľgr crgaľiviľy, gngagg communiľigs, and cglgbraľg ľalgnľ across various domains. Whgľhgr you&#39;rg organizing a dgsign compgľiľion, coding challgngg, or any oľhgr crgaľivg conľgsľ, ConľgsľHub is your go-ľo dgsľinaľion for sgamlgss conľgsľ crgaľion and g cignľ winngr sglgcľion.</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p class="s3" style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">HOME PAGE<i>:</i></p><ol id="l1"><li data-list-text="1."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">The navbar has a logo+website name, Home, and Login<span class="s6">(when not logged in) </span>button. If the user is logged in, his/her profile picture should appear on the navbar.</p><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">If the user clicks on the profile picture, a drop-down will appear with the following items: User name <span class="s6">(not clickable)</span>, Dashboard, and Logout button.</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li><li data-list-text="2."><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">The banner section will have a search bar. Your search word should be based on contest tags. The search implementation functionality should be done in the backend. Also, you make this section unique and look beautiful section</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ul id="l2"><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">This is a popular contest section show ( minimum 5 contests) ( popular filter by user participation count).  For every popular contest show the following properties:</p><ol id="l3"><li data-list-text="a."><p style="padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Name</p></li><li data-list-text="b."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Image but design thinking unique</p></li><li data-list-text="c."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Attempted count ( participants count )</p></li><li data-list-text="d."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Details button ( when clicking the details redirects to the details page )</p></li><li data-list-text="e."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest short Description ( use slice or …)</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li></ol></li></ul></li><li data-list-text="3."><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">This section advertises the competition and shows the contest winner and some relevant text in this section, also inspires the user to participate in the contest. This section must look beautiful and have a unique design. You use some images,  some  text, etc.( this value is dynamic, contest winner, contest participation count) or you can use static text if necessary.</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li><li data-list-text="4."><p style="padding-top: 4pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">This section highlights the best contest creator (minimum 3 creators)with properties: Name, image, contest name, and some contest description ( this section must be dynamic and do not use a simple slider, think of a creative design or any unique slider package).</p></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ul id="l4"><li data-list-text="*"><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">All Contest Page: <span class="p">Create an all-contest route and show all contests added by any content creators. Display the below instruction</span></h4><ul id="l5"><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Name</p></li><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Image but design thinking unique</p></li><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Attempted count ( participants count )</p></li><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Details button ( when clicking the details redirects to the details page )</p></li><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest short Description ( use slice or …)</p></li></ul></li></ul><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">Implement a tab view here according to the contest type/tags.(see add contest feature for more info.)</h4><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">*Contest Details Page: <span class="p">When the user clicks the contest details button redirects to the login page and after login redirects to the details page ( when the user logs login ). This page shows the contest details,</span></h4><ol id="l6"><li data-list-text="a."><p style="padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Name</p></li><li data-list-text="b."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">image/banner</p></li><li data-list-text="c."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Attempted count/ participation count</p></li><li data-list-text="d."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Description and Details.(Task or any relevant info)</p></li><li data-list-text="e."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Prize.</p></li><li data-list-text="f."><p style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 138%;text-align: left;">Contest Winner Name and image. (if the deadline is over and the winner is decided.)</p></li><li data-list-text="g."><p style="padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Show Deadline <b>Counter</b>. This should show a dynamic timer.</p></li><li data-list-text="h."><p style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">Contest Registration Button. When the user clicks on the Contest Registration button, redirect him/her to the payment page. If the payment is completed send the details to the database, and register him/her for the contest.</p></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: justify;">ROLE MANAGEMENT:</h4><p style="padding-top: 6pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: justify;">Implement three roles:</p><ol id="l7"><li data-list-text="1."><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Admin: <span class="p">Admin can approve the contest and update and delete the contest.</span></h4></li><li data-list-text="2."><h4 style="padding-top: 3pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">Contest Creator: <span class="p">The contest creator can add a contest, update the contest and select the winner of the contest.</span></h4><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li><li data-list-text="3."><h4 style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">User: <span class="p">The user Only Participated contest and see her profile/percentage, and won participation details. Details User Dashboard page.</span></h4></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ol id="l8"><li data-list-text="A."><p class="s3" style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">User DashBoard: <span class="p">When a user clicks on the Dashboard, he/she will be redirected to the dashboard route a page where there will be the following routes:</span></p><ol id="l9"><li data-list-text="1."><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">My Participated Contest.</p></li><li data-list-text="2."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">My Winning Contest Page:</p></li><li data-list-text="3."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">My Profile:</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ol id="l10"><li data-list-text="1."><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">My Registered Contest: <span class="p">Show all the contests to the user for which he/she has completed payment. Here the user can participate in each contest till the deadline. Implement a sorting feature to show My upcoming Contests to the user.</span></h4><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li><li data-list-text="2."><h4 style="padding-left: 18pt;text-indent: -13pt;text-align: left;">My Winning Contest Page: <span class="p">Show his/her success here. (Show your creativity here).</span></h4><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li><li data-list-text="3."><h4 style="padding-left: 18pt;text-indent: -13pt;text-align: left;">My Profile: <span class="p">Implement chart for the following:</span></h4><ul id="l11"><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Show The Win percentage ( by attempted and complete )</p></li><li data-list-text="●"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Let a user update his display name and profile picture from this route.</p></li></ul></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li></ol></li><li data-list-text="B."><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">Creator Dashboard: <span class="p">When a user clicks on the Dashboard, he/she will be redirected to a page where there will be the following routes:</span></h4></li></ol><ol id="l12"><li data-list-text="A."><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Add Contest,</p></li><li data-list-text="B."><p style="padding-top: left;">Contest Submitted Page</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ol id="l13"><li data-list-text="A."><h4 style="padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Add Contest Page: <span class="p">This page will have a form with the following fields:</span></h4><ol id="l14"><li data-list-text="a."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Name</p></li><li data-list-text="b."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">image</p></li><li data-list-text="c."><p -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Price</p></li><li data-list-text="e."><p style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Prize money.</p></li><li data-list-text="f."><p style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Task Submission text instruction.</p></li><li data-list-text="g."><p style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 138%;text-align: left;">Contest Type/Tags [Tags should be Business Contest, Medical Contest, Article Writing, Gaming. Don’t Add any other tags.] Use a</p><p style="padding-top: 4pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">dropdown to select the tag name. We recommend the Headless <b>UI</b></p><p style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">dropdown.</p></li><li data-list-text="h."><p style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 113pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Contest Deadline. (Take Date input)</p></li></ol></li><li data-list-text="B."><h4 style="padding-top: 5pt;padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 138%;text-align: justify;">My Created Contest: <span class="p">If a creator visits this page, he/she can see all the contests he/she posted. Show them in tabular form. Each row will have edit and delete buttons for the contest, By default the contest status will be </span>pending. <span class="p">If an admin approves the contest the status changes to </span>accepted<span class="p">. The contest will then appear on the all-contest page. Also if an admin accepts the contest the creator can not edit and delete the contest. Only an admin can delete the contest after this. Also, keep a </span>see submission button <span class="p">for every contest</span>. <span class="p">Clicking on this redirects him/her to the contest-submitted page.</span></h4><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li><li data-list-text="C."><h4 style="padding-left: 77pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">Contest Submitted Page: <span class="p">If a creator visits this page, he/she can see all the submissions of a particular contest he/she posted. Show them in tabular form. Show the contest name and submission details (participant name, email, and submitted task ). Beside every task keep a button. Clicking on this the creator can declare the winner for that particular task. </span>Note: In a contest, there must be only one Winner.</h4></li></ol></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><h3 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">Admin Dashboard:</h3><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">When a user clicks on the Dashboard, he/she will be redirected to a page where there will be the following routes:</p><ol id="l15"><li data-list-text="a."><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Manage User,</p></li><li data-list-text="b."><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Manage Contest,</p></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ol id="l16"><li data-list-text="A."><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">Manage User Page: <span class="p">If an Admin visits this page, he/she can see all the users and Show them in tabular form. Each row will have. user email, and name Here admin can toggle the role of any user(admin&gt;Contest creator&gt;Normal User)</span></h4><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p></li><li data-list-text="B."><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">Manage Contest Page: <span class="p">If an admin visits this page, he/she can see all the contests. Show them in tabular form with two buttons(Delete and Confirm). Show some information on all the contests in each row. Whenever an admin deletes a contest, the contest gets removed from the database.</span></h4><h2 style="padding-top: 3pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">Login and registration systems</h2><p style="padding-top: 8pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">On the Registration and Login pages, display relevant error messages when necessary.</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><h4 style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">Login Page: <span class="p">When a user clicks on the login button, they will be redirected to the login page having the following:</span></h4><ul id="l17"><li data-list-text="○"><p style="padding-left: 15pt;text-indent: -10pt;text-align: fields:</span></h4></li><li data-list-text="○"><p style="padding-left: 15pt;text-indent: -10pt;text-align: left;">Name</p></li><li data-list-text="○"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 15pt;text-indent: -10pt;text-align: left;">Email</p></li><li data-list-text="○"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 15pt;text-indent: -10pt;text-align: left;">Password</p></li><li inconvenience the examiner. If you want, you can add it after receiving the assignment result.</span></h4><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p class="s7" style="padding-top: 9pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">Bonus Tasks</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p class="s8" style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">***Implement tanstack query in all the data fetching functionality (For GET method only) ***</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ol id="l18"><li data-list-text="1."><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 125%;text-align: left;">Implement a /leaderboard route. For example,</span></p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p style="padding-left: 47pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><span><table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tr><td><img width="566" height="64" src="data:image/jpg;base64,"/></td></tr></table></span></p></li><li data-list-text="6."><p style="padding-top: 11pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: justify;">Try to create two extra route, sections relevant to contest platforms, for <b>example </b>The  Contests  Timeline  Visualization  section  and  Participations Progress Tracking.</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p class="s10" style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: 0pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">Note: Not added contact page, review, footer, slider Q/A, etc. Thiking and adding creative design.</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ul id="l19"><li data-list-text="●"><p class="s11" style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 119%;text-align: left;">[ N0 hints will be provided bonus tasks. Make your own decision. ]</p></li></ul></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p class="s7" style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">Optional Tasks</p><p style="padding-top: 3pt;padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">You have to implement any two tasks from the following:</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ol id="l20"><li data-list-text="1)"><p style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;"><a href="https://www.framer.com/motion/animation/" style=" color: black; font-family:Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: none; font-size: 12pt;" target="_blank">Added animation on your website using (</a><span style=" color: #1154CC; font-family:Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt;">framer motion</span><a href="https://www.framer.com/motion/animation/" style=" color: black; font-family:Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: none; font-size: 12pt;" target="_blank">, or </a><span style=" color: #1154CC; font-family:Arial, sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt;">aos</span>)</p></li><li data-list-text="2)"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Implement Axios interceptor.</p></li><li data-list-text="3)"><p style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;line-height: 114%;text-align: left;">Implement a package system for creating a contest. That is, a contest creator can purchase the amount of contests he can post.</p></li></ol><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><p class="s12" style="padding-left: 5pt;text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;">What to Submit</p><p style="text-indent: 0pt;text-align: left;"><br/></p><ol id="l21"><li data-list-text="1."><h4 style="padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Assignment Category: assignment12_category_0005</h4></li><li data-list-text="2."><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Admin email:</h4></li><li data-list-text="3."><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Admin password:</h4></li><li data-list-text="4."><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Front-end Live Site Link:</h4></li><li data-list-text="5."><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Client Side Github Repository Link:</h4></li><li data-list-text="6."><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">Server Side Github Repository Link:</h4></li><li data-list-text="7."><h4 style="padding-top: 2pt;padding-left: 41pt;text-indent: -18pt;text-align: left;">If possible submit creator email and password .</h4></li></ol>
